resources.string: Crypto app is for live market prices, alerts, news for bitcoin and crypto currencies. It gives you the detailed price and market value for individual currencies, market caps, coin details, exchange rates, charts, instant alerts and crypto news on the go. # Prices - Live prices, changes and rates on crypto market. # Alerts - Sets alerts for specific crypto currency. # Markets - Market cap, trades and exchange rates from different currencies. # News - Read the latest news about crypto currencies, market, shares, wallets from famous online portals
